firmware_5_1_required.description:
The PrusaLink integration has been updated to utilise the latest v1 API endpoints, which require firmware version 4.7.0 or later. If you own a Prusa Mini, please make sure your printer is running firmware 5.1.0 or a more recent version, as firmware versions 4.7.x and 5.0.x are not available for this model.

Follow the guide below to update your {entry_title}.
* [Prusa Mini Firmware Update]({prusa_mini_firmware_update})
* [Prusa MK4/XL Firmware Update]({prusa_mk4_xl_firmware_update})

After you've updated your printer's firmware, make sure to reload the config entry to fix this issue.
firmware_5_1_required.title: Firmware update required
